import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./contact.css"; export default function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", subject: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", message: "" }); const [status, setStatus] = useState(""); const [openFAQ, setOpenFAQ] = useState(null); const faqData = [ { question: "What kind of breakfast is served at Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort?", answer: "Guests staying at Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort can enjoy a highly-rated breakfast during their stay (guest review score: 6). Breakfast option(s) include: Continental" }, // ... rest of FAQ data ]; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const toggleFAQ = (index) => { setOpenFAQ(openFAQ === index ? null : index); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const res = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/contact", formData); setStatus("Message Sent Successfully! We'll get back to you soon."); setFormData({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", subject: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", message: "" }); } catch (error) { console.error(error); setStatus("Error sending message. Please try again."); } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

WELCOME

A modern hotel for the modern world.

{/* Contact Form Section */}
GET IN TOUCH

Let's Connect

We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message!

{status &&
{status}
}
{/* FAQ Section */}
FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

{faqData.map((faq, index) => (
toggleFAQ(index)}>

{faq.question}

{faq.answer}

))}
{/* Map Section */}
Location

773 Ocean Shores Blvd NW, Ocean Shores, WA 98569
+1 360-289-0664
Oceanshoresview@gmail.com
); }
